items.title: Weekend predictions: Tron gifts Black Phone 2 a win on weak weekend
bullets: • New releases look likely to earn over $30 million between them, which means we could still squeak out a market win over last weekend and this weekend last year
• Tron: Ares is likely to struggle to top $10 million in its second outing
• The key question is how well it will perform over the long run

items.title: Theater counts: Tron stays on top, widest release locked for second weekend
bullets: • Tron: Ares claimed the top spot at the weekend box office, pulling in $33.24 million
• The sci-fi sequel outpaced fellow newcomer Roofman, by a wide margin, beating it by $25 million
• New this weekend is the 1980’s-set supernatural horror sequel, Black Phone 2
